Comment: >Before long, Fetterman began repeating himself, shouting and questioning why “everybody is mad at me,” “why does everyone hate me, what did I ever do” and slamming his hands on a desk, according to one person who was briefed on what occurred.   ...   Fetterman’s one-time chief of staff Adam Jentleson told a neuropsychiatrist who had treated Fetterman for depression that the senator appeared to be off his recovery plan and was exhibiting alarming behavior, including a tendency toward “long, rambling, repetitive and self-centered monologues.”  That's very disturbing behavior for a US Senator. I really wish the US was set up for recall elections on positions like Senator, because this is definitely a situation that would call for it.
Author: Orzorn

He needs to step down.
